tagline: Smart solutions to accelerate your business

legal_notice_activity: Activity: Portfolio and contact page. All professional services are contracted through the Upwork platform, which manages billing and payments.
privacy_policy_data: The data that users send (email or message) is used solely to respond to their inquiry.
privacy_policy_storage: It is not stored in external databases nor shared with third parties.
